resource "github_repository_ruleset" "default-branch" {
 name = "main"
 repository = "repo-name"
 target = "branch"
 enforcement = "active"

 conditions {
 ref_name {
 include = ["~DEFAULT_BRANCH"]
 exclude = []
 }
 }

 required_signatures = true

 }
}
